data.actual_result: When you scroll down, the Emote reaction page starts to scroll up and down frantically and randomly.
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll through the emotes, and find the reaction (Emote) you want to use.
data.short_description: After clicking on *Add Reaction*, it brings the user into the reaction page (as usual), then it starts to jump around and skip through the categories (of emotes) in a random order.
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold finger on message  - Select *Add Reaction*  - Scroll down
